text:
Dec 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5:
• Working on assigned issues
• Got 4 issues assigned
• Raised 4 PRs for the respective issues
• Received suggestions and implemented all suggested changes
• Waiting for review and merge on all 4 PRs
Requesting to be assigned new issues so I can continue contributing further

Please review and give me new tasks. i am Waiting for new task.
My PRs have been reviewed and approved, but they haven’t been merged for the last week.
Here is the link: https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pulls/adarsh-priydarshi-5646

Dec 8th Update:
• Raised PR on the assigned issue
• Waiting for a new task
• PRs are ready for merge:- https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pulls/adarsh-priydarshi-5646

Dec 8 & 9
• Waiting for a new task

Dec 10
• merged 1 pr
• reviewed prs
• Waiting for next task

Dec 10th
• made some changes in existing PR
• Waiting for next task

Dec 11
• Created 3 new issues.
• Made the requested changes in the existing PR as suggested by the mentor.
• Waiting for a new task.

Dec 12th:
• Created 2 new issues.
• 1 PR merged Remove console.log statements from production code
• waiting for a new task.

Dec 16
• Some previously approved PRs were closed today. I’m reviewing this to understand what can be improved.
• Currently waiting for a new task.
• Actively looking for new issues to work on and helping other contributors where possible.
• Links :- https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/14670 , https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/14647

Dec 16 & 17
• Reopened my previously closed PRs:
◦ #14824 Validation bypass when removing items from questionnaire
◦ #14818 Slug validation not clearing when manually edited in ValueSet form
• Reviewed PRs
• Created a new issue:
◦ #14840 Implement route-based code splitting to reduce initial bundle size
◦ #14827 Memory leak in AudioPlayer due to incorrect event listener cleanup
◦ #14825 Hardcoded "Remove" text should use i18n translation in QuestionnaireForm
Next
• Waiting for a new task (for the past 4 days)

Dec 18 & 19
• Raised PRs on assigned issues
• 3 PRs have been approved by team members and are ready for merge
• Reviewed PRs
• Currently waiting for a new task
